question: Some people feel that legal age at which people can marry should be at least 21. To what extent do you agree  or disagree?
text: Deciding Marriage age is a significant decision of life. A number of individuals hold the assumption that the minimum valid age of being qualified for marriage ought to be 21 years old. The essay will subscribe to agree with this view despite having some potential problems.

The view can have various difficulties. Firstly, there is a great of regions in the world where people can alive only 40 to 45 years. On the other hand, a host of individuals is in favour of  at least 21 years of being a valid couple although considerable drawbacks are visible. Because it is high time to determines and enlighten their future.
